title: HELP Can i change my email?
body: Hello my email account has recently been hacked and i have no way to get to it is there anyway i can change my email without have to send a code to my previous one that got hacked?

replies.body: If you're able to verify yourself as the original account creator, you can reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and should be able to get that email updated.
